      Constructor for Player, constructs a moveable waka The constructor constructs a waka which is what the player controls to navigate the maze to consumer all the fruit and superFruits

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.util.ArrayList<soda> sodaList,
              java.util.ArrayList<superFruit> superFruitList,
              java.util.ArrayList<Fruit> fruitList,
              java.lang.String[][] map,
              boolean[][] path,
              int lives,
              int speed,
              java.lang.String filename,
              processing.core.PImage playerClosed,
              processing.core.PImage playerDown,
              processing.core.PImage playerLeft,
              processing.core.PImage playerRight,
              processing.core.PImage playerUp)
        Constructor for Player, constructs a moveable waka The constructor constructs a waka which is what the player controls to navigate the maze to consumer all the fruit and superFruits
        Parameters:
        sodaList - a list of soda objects in the map
        superFruitList - a list of superFruit objects in the map
        fruitList - a list of fruit objects in the map
        map - a 2D array of all cell objects read from the map text file
        path - the mazepath available for Entities to traverse
        lives - the amount of lives the waka has in total
        speed - the speed the waka navigates the maze
        filename - the filename of the map text file used to find the start location of the waka
        playerClosed - the sprite for the waka when the mouth is closed
        playerDown - the sprite for the waka when mouth is open and facing down
        playerLeft - the sprite for the waka when mouth is open and facing left
        playerRight - the sprite for the waka when mouth is open and facing right
        playerUp - the sprite for the waka when mouth is open and facing up

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick(char input)
        The method for conducting the logic of the waka This handles movement inputs from the player and ensures that the waka performs the right movement according to player input and traversable path Also checks if the waka is currently eating a collectible, including fruit, superFruit and Soda and changes the attribute of the collectible to eaten
        Specified by:
        tick in class MovingEntities
        Parameters:
        input - the input from the player for the movement of the waka

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        The draw function for the Player class It draws to the screen the updated positions of the waka and its current mouth state Also determines whether which mouth state the waka is currenlty in and draws it accordingly
        Specified by:
        draw in class MovingEntities
        Parameters:
        app - the PApplet App that it will draw to

        Parameters:
